DOC.brief_summary: Patients serious chronic renal insufficiency usually develop secondary osteoporosis bone loss , especially chronic dialysis , degree bone loss correct decrease renal function . In traditional Chinese medicine , kidney function consider dominate bone development metabolism . Kidney Yin Yang replenishment help improve bone development metabolism .
DOC.brief_title: Kidney Yin/Yang Replenishment Patients With Renal Osteodystrophy
DOC.detailed_description: In study patient chronic renal insufficiency secondary osteoporosis bone loss evaluate traditional Chinese medicine standard allocate kidney Yin deficiency kidney Yang deficiency group . In Yin deficiency group , patient divide Zuogui granule treatment group placebo group . In Yang deficiency group , patient divide Yuogui granule treatment group placebo group . All patient also accept basic treatment . After 3-month-treatment , detect blood urea nitrogen , creatinine , bone mineral density , bone metabolism marker include FGF23 , 1,25 ( OH ) 2D3 , Osteocalcin , PTH , BALP , serum urinal Ca , P. We also perform miRNA array . The data treatment treatment compare . The data treatment group placebo group also compare .
